# AnnotationContext

**Structure**

Information about an item that you add an annotation to.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AnnotationContext
```

## Instance Properties

- **targetSize**: Gets the bounding box of the items being annotated.

## Annotations

- **AnnotationPosition**: The position of an annotation.
- **AnnotationOverflowResolution**

items.description: Gets the bounding box of the items being annotated.
items.name: targetSize
